title: bitbytemoney
author: bitbytemoney
content: Please tell me all the possible ways I can earn some bitcoin,as a developer.I can write C++, Rust, and Go. I want to use this capability.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: 1) Apply for freelancing sites such as Upwork and look for open job positions there. These jobs are usually short term but you can expect to earn a few hundred bucks from there. Some of these sites pay out directly in crypto.Or,2) Check the Altcoin announcements and Altcoin Marketplace boards because thes are usually full of open job positions. Mostly for smart contracts but you can occasionally find some serious work there.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: bitbytemoney on May 18, 2022, 03:25:43 AMPlease tell me all the possible ways I can earn some bitcoin,as a developer.Bitcoin is money, hence you can:* work for Bitcoin if you find employer who can pay like that* work for fiat and exchange that yourself into Bitcoin (easiest to achieve)* develop your entrepreneurship skills and do something that can earn you fiat or BitcoinI can write code myself, still, I couldn't sell my coding skills for Bitcoin. I've got a tip once for some code, but that was all. So if you think that you'll find here the ultimate answer, please lower your expectations.

comments.author: keios
comments.body: Quote from: bitbytemoney on May 18, 2022, 03:25:43 AMPlease tell me all the possible ways I can earn some bitcoin,as a developer.I can write C++, Rust, and Go. I want to use this capability.How about some links to your completed work? Or maybe a project in progress? Don't tell people what you can do, show them.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: bitbytemoney on May 18, 2022, 03:25:43 AMPlease tell me all the possible ways I can earn some bitcoin,as a developer.I can write C++, Rust, and Go. I want to use this capability.You need to build a portfolio, as keios suggested.Once you have a portfolio your should announce yourself and abilities in the Services boardhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0I would also keep an eye in this board, as from time to time someone shows up asking for a developer to be paid in bitcoin for a job.I have already done a few front-end and back-end jobs which paid in btc, just wondering around here and found them.
